item.description:
Holiday Party, with at least 6 meetup groups and an Actors Repertory Theatre Group. The venue has a relaxed atmosphere, and free live music with great musicians. PA's Lounge in Union Sq, 345 Washington St. Somerville, MA. Starts at 7.30PM.

Party goers, Dancers, Singles, Musicians, & Singers - Come join the party! Bring your friends for the party, network, and meet interesting people, actors, musicians & singles. The meetups who are attending are Boston Nights, Tall Singles, a non meetup Actors Repertory Theatre group, 4 musician meetups and probably others.

Everyone Welcome. Music by Brock and Roll Revival and other featured musicians, singers and singer songwriters. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers. This house band has regular monthly performances at Tommy Doyles, (former House of Blues) Harvard Sq.

If you want to eat, bring a little food, or donate 3$ for food and enjoy inexpensive drinks from the bar.
item.name: Holiday Party with Live Music
